info2: You will need to create a service account, then click Generate New JSON Key
info3: Keep this file PRIVATE!!! and rename it google-api-credentials.json
info4: The service account you created in the previous step has an email address.
info5: Go to https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/#management/Settings/ and select 'User Management' for your account, property or view
info6: Then add this email address as a new user
